amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to ensure that the Bureau of Land Management collaborates with States in efforts to promote sustainable sage-grouse habitat by developing and approving State plans that prevent the listing of the bird under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 and preserve the way of life in, and economic health of, the impacted areas.

action.text: Amendment SA 293 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Heller.

vote.text: Amendment SA 293 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
